config.twitch.connection.title: Twitch Connection Info
config.twitch.connection.info: NOTE: Connection information changes are applied upon each game load
config.twitch.connection.username.toolti: The name of the Twitch account you want to use as login
config.twitch.connection.targetchannel.t: The name of the Twitch channel you want to read the chat of
config.twitch.connection.pagelink: Click to set chat password (OAuth Token)
config.twitch.connection.pagelink.toolti: DO NOT CLICK THIS ON STREAM
config.twitch.behavior.title: Behavior Options
config.twitch.behavior.info: This area can be changed at any time without a restart.
config.twitch.behavior.ignorecommands.to: This will make any message that's prefixed with a ! to not appear
config.twitch.behavior.systemmessages.to: This shows messages such as subscriptions/resubs/raids in the chat
config.twitch.behavior.filteredusers.too: Comma separated list of account names to ignore from the chat
config.twitch.password.title: Twitch OAuth Password
config.twitch.password.info: NOTE: this must be the full chat token including the oauth: prefix
config.twitch.password.password.tooltip: This is the account password for the twitch account set as the username

twitch.status.error.exception: Encountered an error, most likely caused by invalid Twitch login credentials.
twitch.status.error.reconnect: Twitch has requested us to reconnect, please go back to the main menu when possible
